meaningMnemonic: You <radical>receive</radical> instruction in a <radical>circle</radical> in the <radical>dirt</radical>. Where are you? <kanji>Cram school</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: Not only does your <kanji>cram school</kanji> teach kids in a circle in the dirt, it also plays music on a <reading>juke</reading>box (じゅく). Yes, a jukebox. They believe a jukebox's tunes help with cramming.
